items.sentence: I want to make sure you\'re going to be all right.
Tom\'s first week on the job didn\'t go very well.
Tom\'s goal is to own a house before he\'s thirty.
The police handcuffed Tom and read him his rights.
There is no admission fee for children under five.
I wonder whether Tom will be here tomorrow or not.
I\'m not convinced that you\'re telling the truth.
Tom tried to catch up with Mary, but he couldn\'t.
Tom tried to kiss Mary, but she wouldn\'t let him.
Tom tried to persuade Mary to go to John\'s party.
